name: vdt
description: A template engine based on virtual-dom

scripts.build: browserify src/browserify.js -o dist/vdt.js -s Vdt -u src/lib/compile.js && uglifyjs dist/vdt.js -o dist/vdt.min.js -m
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch && bower version patch 2>/dev/null; git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor && bower version minor 2>/dev/null; git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major && bower version major 2>/dev/null; git push origin master --tags && npm publish
